mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, user_name, user_birthday, user_gender, user_email, user_tel, user_provider_type, user_password) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{birthday}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{providerType}, #{password})
mapper.select: select user_id as id, user_name as name, user_birthday as birthday, user_gender as gender, user_email as email, user_tel as tel, is_disabled as disabled, user_provider_type as providerType, user_password as password from user where user_id = #{value}
